==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
{{zh-compound|知|音|to know, to perceive, to comprehend|sound}}

From the old Chinese story about the deep friendship between two men, {{w|Bo Ya|Boya}} (a [[qin]] player) and {{w|zh:鍾子期|Ziqi}} (a [[woodcutter]]). Despite Ziqi's humble background, upon hearing Boya play his qin he was surprisingly able to tell which subjects each of the pieces represented.
